Class ProgressBar

java.lang.Object

          org.apache.wicket.markup.html.WebMarkupContainer
              org.odlabs.wiquery.ui.progressbar.ProgressBar
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, org.apache.wicket.IClusterable, org.apache.wicket.IConverterLocator, IWiQueryPlugin
public class ProgressBar
extends org.apache.wicket.markup.html.WebMarkupContainer
implements IWiQueryPlugin

$Id: ProgressBar.java 415 2010-09-17 21:32:54Z lionel.armanet $

Creates a progressBar UI component from this WebMarkupContainer's HTML markup.

Since:
1.0
Author:
Lionel Armanet
